forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 53. Northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain after 8pm. Cloudy. Low around 41, with temperatures rising to around 43 overnight. East northeast wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. North wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Slight Chance Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 5am, then a slight chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 32. North northwest wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.date: 4/02/25- Closed due to a major ice storm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments: The area surrounding Nub's Nob has experienced a massive ice storm that has left much destruction in its wake. Power has recently been restored to the lodge and our Crew is beginning the clean-up effort that includes thousands of down tree branches on our slopes and the road leading to Nub's Nob.  The lodge and locker room are open from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM if you need to stop out to grab your skis. There is a small chance we could open on very limited terrain on Saturday and Sunday. We will make that decision tomorrow by noon. We hope to see you on the slopes real soon
